components.description: Committing an offence under section 148 of the Motor Vehicle Act.

onChange.customAction: (function() { if (!this.value) { data.speed_limit = null; data.vehicle_speed = null; data.speed_estimation_technique = ''; data.speed_confirmation_technique = ''; } })

components.label: Prohibited
components.description: Driving while prohibited under the Motor Vehicle Act, Criminal Code, Youth Justice Act or Youth Criminal Justice Act (Canada).

components.label: Suspended
components.description: Driving while suspended under section 89 or section 232 of the Motor Vehicle Act.

components.label: Street Racing
components.description: Driving or operating a motor vehicle in a race as defined in the Motor Vehicle Act and the officer intends to charge with an offence.

components.label: Stunt Driving
components.description: Driving or operating a motor vehicle in a stunt as defined in the Motor Vehicle Act and the officer intends to charge with an offence.

components.label: Motorcycle (seating)
components.description: Committing an offence under section 194 (1) or (2) of the Motor Vehicle Act.

components.label: Unlicensed (UL)
components.description: Driving without a valid driver's licence and with a notice on the driving record indicating a previous conviction for driving while unlicensed

onChange.customAction: (function() { if (!this.value) { data.unlicenced_prohibition_number = ''; data.belief_driver_bc_resident = ''; data.out_of_province_dl = ''; data.out_of_province_dl_number = ''; data.out_of_province_dl_jurisdiction = null; data.out_of_province_dl_expiry = null; } })

components.label: Page 3
Did you serve the {{formNamesString}} document{{formNames.length > 1 ? 's' : ''}} to {{driverLastName}}, {{driverGivenName}}?

I, the peace officer identified below, certify that on {{formSubmittedDate}}, I personally served a notice of {{twelveHourForm ? 'suspension number' : 'prohibition number'}} {{formNumbers}} on {{driverLastName}}, {{driverGivenName}}.
DATE CERTIFIED (YYYY-MM-DD)

components.html: The individual's licence to drive is hereby suspended under section 90.3 of the Motor Vehicle Act for a period of 12 hours, commencing at: {{data?.date_of_driving? new Date(data?.date_of_driving).toISOString().split('T')[0] : 'N/A'}}, {{data?.time_of_driving? data?.time_of_driving: 'N/A'}} PACIFIC TIME
components.label: The individual's licence to drive is hereby suspended
components.customConditional: show = data?.TwelveHour

components.html: The individual is prohibited under section 215 of the Motor Vehicle Act from driving a motor vehicle for 24 hours commencing at: {{data?.date_of_driving ? new Date(data?.date_of_driving).toISOString().split('T')[0] : 'N/A'}}, {{data?.time_of_driving ? data?.time_of_driving: 'N/A'}} PACIFIC TIME
components.label: The individual is prohibited under section 215
components.customConditional: show = data?.TwentyFourHour

components.label: Next

components.title: Police Details
components.customConditional: show = (data?.TwentyFourHour && data?.prescribed_test_used === "YES");
components.label: Page 4
Did the Driver request a breath test or prescribed physical coordination test?
If yes, what test was administered?

values.label: No test was administered in forming reasonable grounds

components.customConditional: show = data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES' && data?.type_of_prohibition === 'alcohol';

components.label: ASD Expiry Date
components.customConditional: show = data?.requested_test_used_alcohol === 'alco-sensor' && data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES' && data?.type_of_prohibition === 'alcohol';

components.label: Time the test was administered
components.customConditional: show = (data?.requested_test_used_alcohol === 'instrument' || data?.requested_test_used_alcohol === 'PPCT' || data?.requested_test_used_alcohol === 'alco-sensor') && data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES' && data?.type_of_prohibition === 'alcohol';

components.label: Result
components.customConditional: show = data?.requested_test_used_alcohol === 'alco-sensor' && data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES' && data?.type_of_prohibition === 'alcohol';

components.label: BAC Result(mg%)
components.customConditional: show = data?.requested_test_used_alcohol === 'instrument' && data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES' && data?.type_of_prohibition === 'alcohol';

components.label: Approved Instrument Used
components.customConditional: show = (data?.requested_test_used_alcohol === 'instrument' || data?.requested_test_used_drug === 'approved-drug') && data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES';

components.label: Which test was used?
components.customConditional: show = data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES' && data?.type_of_prohibition === 'drugs';

components.label: Ability to drive affected by a drug?
components.customConditional: show = data?.requested_test_used_drug === 'PPCT' && data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES' && data?.type_of_prohibition === 'drugs';

components.label: Ability to drive affected by alcohol? (only select if PPCT test used)
components.customConditional: show = data?.requested_test_used_alcohol === 'PPCT' && data?.requested_prescribed_test === 'YES' && data?.type_of_prohibition === 'alcohol';

components.label: Next
